source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_SEQ_00<tab>Vajra is ready to guide you to Djanan Qhat.
target: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_SEQ_00<tab>ウィルラ・ニリヤのヴァジュラは、戦いの準備ができるのを待っている。

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_SEQ_01<tab>Upon witnessing her daughter's death at the hands of Fordola and her Skulls, the Qalyana broodmother cried out to the heavens in despair...and a primal answered. Sri Lakshmi, patron deity of the Ananta, came forth from the aether, and the imperials were put to flight. Alas, the tale did not end there, for now the Qalyana demand that the Vira come and pay tribute to the goddess. And so it falls to you and your comrades to journey unto the Qalyana stronghold of Djanan Qhat, where Sri Lakshmi now holds court.
target: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_SEQ_01<tab>カステッルム・ベロジナを越え、ピーリングストーンズを訪れた冒険者たちのもとに、アナンタ族のカリヤナ派が神降ろしをしたという報せが届けられた。「暁」の仲間や、ウィルラ派のアナンタ族の協力を受け、これに対応することになった。ギラバニア辺境地帯のサトヤ・マガにいる「ヴァジュラ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_SEQ_02<tab>Vajra leads you to the edge of the Qalyana settlement and tells you of the aetheryte within, which will deliver you to the heart of Djanan Qhat. However, given what they have heard of the primal's reclusive behavior, your comrades have expressed reservations. Must all primals be slain? Are they truly beyond reason?
target: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_SEQ_02<tab>ヴァジュラから、地下神殿への行き方を教えてもらった。ギラバニア辺境地帯のジャナン・カットにある「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EA48801 /var>」と交感しよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_SEQ_03<tab>Fortunately, as is often the case, simply attuning with the aetheryte is enough to grant you and your comrades access to the inner sanctum. Caution is the order of the day, and so you will refrain from a direct assault and instead attempt to gain a better understanding of the situation surreptitiously.
target: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_SEQ_03<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EA48801 /var>と交感した。さっそく、美神の地下神殿のジャナン・カット地下祭壇へ向かおう。

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_SEQ_04<tab>You look on in silence as Sri Lakshmi impassively explains to the distraught Qalyana broodmother that while her daughter's flesh has been restored to life, her soul is forever lost. Watching the forlorn spectacle, you are reminded once more of Ga Bu, the kobold boy whom you could not save, and of the cycle of misery perpetuated by the primals. But the anger you feel is naught to that of Alisaie, who, forsaking all concealment, proceeds to loudly decry Sri Lakshmi for her empty promises, before begging the Qalyana to see her for the false god she is. Alas, the broodmother will not listen, and the primal soon takes umbrage. With a wave of her hand, she sends orbs of energy towards you as a warning. Leave her lands and her dreamers be.
target: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_SEQ_04<tab>美神「ラクシュミ」と言葉を交わした。ジャナン・カット地下祭壇の「アリゼー」と話そう。

source:
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_SEQ_05Twice has Alisaie watched helplessly as those consumed by tragedy have turned to primals for succor. Yet though she could do no more for the broodmother than she could for Ga Bu, she had to try...did she not? Either way, her failure has left you with no recourse but to meet the primal in single combat─ably abetted by the goodly adventurers who you had the wisdom and foresight to summon to Djanan Qhat in anticipation of this outcome. Sri Lakshmi must be slain.

※Emanation can be accessed via the Duty Finder.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_SEQ_05アリゼーから想いを託された。美神「ラクシュミ」を討伐し、悲しみの連鎖を断ち切ろう！

※コンテンツファインダーから攻略に参加できます。

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_SEQ_06<tab>With a flash of light, the Lady of Bliss departs, and with her whatever succor her dreamers may have enjoyed. Naught remains to keep you here...
target: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_SEQ_06<tab>ラクシュミに勝利した。ギラバニア辺境地帯に戻り、皆と合流しよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_SEQ_07<tab>As you tell Lyse of the primal's passing, the Qalyana broodmother appears, bereft at the death of her god. Though Lyse tries to reason with the grieving mother, she condemns you and your actions, demanding at last that you leave her to mourn. And so you do.
target: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_SEQ_07<tab>カリヤナ派に追い出されるように、地下神殿を後にした。サトヤ・マガの「リセ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_SEQ_08<tab>Though the Vira will not soon forget your deeds this day, neither will the Qalyana. Was there another way you could have resolved the situation? Perhaps...but you will never know.
target: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_SEQ_08<tab>リセと話した。カリヤナ派と完全に和解することができたわけではないが、しばらくの間、ウィルラ派の安全は確保されただろう。カリヤナ派とも、いつか理解しあえる日がくるのだろうか……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_SEQ_09<tab>
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_SEQ_10<tab>
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_SEQ_11<tab>
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_SEQ_12<tab>
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_SEQ_13<tab>
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_SEQ_14<tab>
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_SEQ_15<tab>
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_SEQ_16<tab>
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_SEQ_17<tab>
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_SEQ_18<tab>
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_SEQ_19<tab>
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_SEQ_20<tab>
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_SEQ_21<tab>
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_SEQ_22<tab>
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_SEQ_23<tab>
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_TODO_00<tab>Follow Vajra.
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_TODO_01<tab>Attune to the aetheryte at Djanan Qhat.
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_TODO_02<tab>Attune to the aetheryte in Djanan Qhat.
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Alisaie.
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_TODO_04<tab>Use the Duty Finder to confront Sri Lakshmi in Emanation.
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_TODO_05<tab>Use the Duty Finder to confront Sri Lakshmi in Emanation.
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_TODO_06<tab>Speak with Lyse.
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_TODO_07<tab>
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_TODO_08<tab>
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_TODO_09<tab>
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_TODO_10<tab>
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_TODO_11<tab>
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_TODO_12<tab>
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_TODO_13<tab>
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_TODO_14<tab>
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_TODO_15<tab>
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_TODO_16<tab>
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_TODO_17<tab>
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_TODO_18<tab>
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_TODO_19<tab>
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_TODO_20<tab>
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_TODO_21<tab>
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_TODO_22<tab>
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_TODO_23<tab>
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALISAIE_000_001<tab>We were too late for him in Limsa, but this time...this time...
target: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALISAIE_000_001<tab>ガ・ブのことを思い出すと、どうしても……ね。

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALPHINAUD_000_005<tab>I am reminded of the tragedy we bore witness to beneath O'Ghomoro, when poor Ga Bu cried out in despair and rage, and Titan came forth in answer...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALPHINAUD_000_005死した娘の復活を願ったカリヤナの族長、
そして、死した両親との再会を願ったガ・ブ……。
今回の件は、どこかオ・ゴモロでの事件を思い起こさせる。

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_LYSE_000_010<tab>I'm not sure why Alisaie's so eager to face this primal all of a sudden, but you won't hear me complaining!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_LYSE_000_010アリゼーの熱い気持ち、アタシにも伝わってきたからさ、
自然と気合も入っちゃうよね。

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_VAJRA_000_020<tab>You are ready? Hm. You look ready.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_VAJRA_000_020シュー……どうやら準備は万端のようだな。
では、さっそくだが移動を始めよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_VAJRA_000_021<tab>Djanan Qhat. There you find the Qalyana's cryssstals, and Sri Lakshmi. Follow me.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_VAJRA_000_021美神ラクシュミを奉ずる地下神殿は、
カリヤナ派の城、「ジャナン・カット」の内部にある。
そこに至る道筋を案内しよう……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALISAIE_000_025<tab>I expected more resistance. Let us pray our luck holds...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALISAIE_000_025ここまでは、すんなり接近できたわね。
順調に進んできていると信じたいところだけど……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALPHINAUD_000_030<tab>It would be in our best interest to avoid any confrontation unless absolutely necessary. The primal and the crystals are our primary objectives.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALPHINAUD_000_030なるべくなら、アナンタ族との交戦は避けたいところだ。
あくまでも今回の目的は、蛮神への対処だけなのだから……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_LYSE_000_035<tab>We should follow their lead and let them do any fighting for now. You'll need your strength when the time comes.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_LYSE_000_035アルフィノとアリゼーのフォローなら任せて。
あなたには、ラクシュミとの戦いに備えて、
できるだけ体力を温存してもらいたいからさ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_VAJRA_000_040<tab>Djanan Qhat. The path leads to an entrance above.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_VAJRA_000_040シュー……このまま東へ進むと、
高台の上に建つ大きな建物が見えてくる。
それこそが、目的のジャナン・カットだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_VAJRA_000_041<tab>Within is an aetheryte. You must use it to enter.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_VAJRA_000_041地下神殿に向かうには、
入口に据えられたエーテライトを利用するといい。
ヒトの子であっても、使うことができるだろう。

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALPHINAUD_000_042<tab>Understood. With me, everyone!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALPHINAUD_000_042了解だ、案内に感謝する。
それでは、みんな……ジャナン・カットまで一気に接近し、
「ジャナン・エーテライト」を使って突入するぞ！

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_VAJRA_000_050<tab>The aetheryte is within. I will go no further. Good luck, eikon-slayer.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_VAJRA_000_050地下神殿に向かうには、
入口に据えられたエーテライトを利用するといい。
ヒトの子であっても、使うことができるだろう。

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALPHINAUD_000_070<tab>(I knew things were not going to end well the moment she stepped out of hiding...)
target:
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALPHINAUD_000_070アリゼーが飛び出したときには、
どうなるものかと、肝を冷やしたよ。
君のおかげで助かった……ありがとう。

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_LYSE_000_075<tab>Ugh... Is there really no way we can fight alongside you without being turned into one of her dreamers?
target:
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_LYSE_000_075アタシたちがテンパードにされずに済む方法ってないのかな。
それがあれば、あなたと一緒に思いっきり戦えるのに！

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALISAIE_000_080<tab>I know, I know, it was stupid and foolish but...but I had to try, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I had to.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALISAIE_000_080ごめんなさい、無茶なことをして……。
それでも、どうしても、カリヤナの族長に、
蛮神に頼ることを止めてほしいと、伝えたかったのよ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALISAIE_000_081<tab>
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALISAIE_000_082<tab>I had to try...and I failed. So you have to fight. There is no other way.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALISAIE_000_082でも……悔しいけど、私の言葉は届かなかった。
カリヤナの族長の心を変えることはできなかった……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALISAIE_000_083<tab>
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_Q1_000_150<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_A1_000_151<tab>I'll wake them from the dream.
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_A1_000_152<tab>Never stop trying.
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_A1_000_153<tab>Primals cannot be suffered to live. You know this.
target: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_A1_000_153<tab>結局、蛮神は討滅するしかない

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALISAIE_000_084<tab>Thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I know you will.
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALISAIE_100_084<tab>It means a lot to hear you say that. It does. But it doesn't make it any easier to have to ask you to face that...that thing.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALISAIE_100_084)) (( )) 02 /var>……ありがとう……。
でも、結局はあなたの力に頼ることになってしまった……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALISAIE_200_084<tab>Maybe so, but every time we must turn to you and others like you to do what we cannot. I just wish there was another way...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALISAIE_200_084そうね……でも、もう何度目なのかしら……。
最後には超える力を持つ、あなたに頼ることになる。
本当にごめんなさい……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALISAIE_300_084<tab>We can but do that which is within our power. Lyse, Alphinaud, and I will go and seize their crystal stores. This will not happen again.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALISAIE_300_084でも、私にもできることはあるはず……。
あなたが美神と戦っている間、アルフィノやリセと協力して、
アナンタ族が備蓄しているクリスタルへの対処をしてみる。

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALISAIE_400_084<tab>And you... When it is finished...we will be waiting for you.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALISAIE_400_084だからお願い……。
どうか、どうか必ず生きて戻って！

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALISAIE_000_085<tab>We came too late for Ga Bu, but perhaps, this time, when the primal is no more...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALISAIE_000_085備蓄のクリスタルについては、
アルフィノとリセと協力して、どうにかしてみせる。
あなたが美神を倒した後、すぐに再召喚されないようにね。

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_SCENE00015_EVENTAREA_WARP_YESNO_TITLE<tab>Proceed into Emanation?
target: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_SCENE00015_EVENTAREA_WARP_YESNO_TITLE<tab>「ジャナン・カット地下祭壇」へ移動しますか？

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALPHINAUD_000_110<tab>We had to use force to secure the crystals. Alisaie...was not gentle.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALPHINAUD_000_110アナンタ族が備蓄していたクリスタルは、処分しておいたよ。
アリゼーが、少々手荒な方法を使ってね……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALISAIE_000_115<tab>You've finished, then. Good. I'm glad it's over.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALISAIE_000_115……おつかれさま。
無事に戻ってきてくれて、嬉しいわ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_VAJRA_000_120<tab>Hm. You yet live... I had my doubtsss. Welcome back.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_VAJRA_000_120シュー……戻りが遅いので心配していた。
生きた状態で、ふたたび会えたことを嬉しく思う。

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_LYSE_000_130<tab>I wish we could have left on better terms, but that was never going to happen. It could be a problem if they get their hands on any more crystals, though...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_LYSE_000_130これで少なくとも、しばらくの間は、
ウィルラ派のアナンタ族が安全になったね……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_LYSE_000_131<tab>Never mind. We'll deal with that when the time comes.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_LYSE_000_131これ以上、悲しい出来事を繰り返させないためにも、
ギラバニアから、帝国軍を追い出さないと……。
アタシ、頑張るよ、)) (( )) 02 /var>！
